short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Strava Kudo All automates the process of giving kudos to your fellow athletes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview

Strava Kudo All streamlines the process of giving kudos to your fellow athletes. Kudo All for Strava is a dynamic browser extension that enhances your Strava experience by automating kudos. With a single click, you can easily acknowledge and celebrate the efforts and successes of your Strava community.

Key Features:

Seamless Kudos Automation: Once installed, Strava Kudo All intelligently identifies activities on your Strava feed and automatically gives kudos to deserving athletes. Forget the tedium of manual kudosâ€”let the extension do the work for you.

Elevate Your Strava Experience: Enhance your interaction with the Strava community with Strava Kudo All. Effortlessly spread positivity and encouragement. Save time, connect with peers, and honor their accomplishments through automated kudos. Install Strava Kudo All now for a more engaging and supportive Strava experience!

Source code available: https://github.com/ozbillwang/strava-kudo-all
